meanings.definition: A person who fences with a foil.
meanings.sent1: The young foilists practiced their fencing skills diligently.
meanings.sent2: The foilists competed in the local tournament.
meanings.sent3: The foilists decided to have a friendly match to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fencing, the foilists are like graceful dancers with swords.
meanings.sent5: The coach praised the foilists for their precise movements and quick reflexes.
